english_example_sentence: By thinking carefully about the difficult problem, she found the right solution
russian_example_sentence: Думая внимательно о сложной проблеме, она нашла правильное решение
turkish_example_sentence: Zor problemi dikkatle düşünerek, o doğru çözümü buldu
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Zor problemi dikkatle ______, o doğru çözümü buldu
